text:
Hi everyone, I have an issue with hard bounce with this error
"Hard bounced (Unknown user)
Recipient's email address is invalid, misspelled, or blocking incoming email
UNKNOWN_USER 550 5.7.1 [50.31.57.54 13] Messages with multiple addresses in From: header are not accepted. a23si888261eje.157 - gsmtp"

I already tried to several way to fix the issue : changing the sender email ; changing the template but so far nothing is working and even my test email to my own mailbox are being rejected with the same message. 

Any idea on how to fix it ?

Hi everyone,

I want to help in HubSpot form.
How can validate email address with website domain in form?
is there a way to get all the web version links for the email newsletters dynamically via API ???

Hey :wave:
is there a free HubSpot developer account including the CMS so I can work on my skills and present the results?
